questions.question_text_1: Suppose Alice has five heaps of sizes 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, and Bob has two boxes: one with three heaps of sizes 6, 7, 8, and another one with two heaps of sizes 9 and 10. Can Bob pick one heap from each box to ensure a win?

questions.question_text_1: Suppose Alice has two heaps of the same size. Who wins in this setting?

options.option_text: Alice can ensure a win no matter what is there in Bob’s boxes
Bob can ensure a win no matter what is there in his boxes
It depends on the heap sizes in Bob’s boxes and/or Bob’s strategy
